name: vcf_to_plink
title: Convert VCF file to PLINK file
summary: Uses PLINK 1.9 to convert VCF files to PLINK bed/bim/fam files

inputSpec.name: variants_vcfgzs
inputSpec.label: VCF File(s)
inputSpec.help: VCF file(s) to convert to PLINK format.

inputSpec.name: variants_vcfgztbis
inputSpec.label: VCF Index File(s)
inputSpec.help: Index files for VCF file(s) to convert to PLINK format.

inputSpec.name: snp_only
inputSpec.label: Output SNPs only?
inputSpec.help: Only convert SNPs to PLINK format?

inputSpec.name: biallelic
inputSpec.label: Output Biallelic Markers only?
inputSpec.help: Only convert biallelic markers to PLINK format?

inputSpec.name: strict
inputSpec.label: Output strict biallelic markers only
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Only output strict biallelic markers to PLINK format?

inputSpec.name: prefix
inputSpec.label: Prefix for files
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Any string to prefix to output file names.

outputSpec.name: bed_out
outputSpec.label: PLINK BED file
outputSpec.help: The BED file generated by PLINK.

outputSpec.name: bim_out
outputSpec.label: PLINK BIM file
outputSpec.help: The BIM file generated by PLINK.

outputSpec.name: fam_out
outputSpec.label: PLINK FAM file
outputSpec.help: The FAM file generated by PLINK.

details.whatsNew: *1.0.0 First version of the Convert VCF file to PLINK file app.
